name: Blocky Cops Smash Full
description:
***This a full and ad-free version of Blocky Cops Smash***

Be a demolition warrior in a blocky city and drive down the road of destruction!

Unleash destruction on streets of blocky city! Drive powerful cars to smash and crash everything. City demolition is your sol purpose in Blocky Cops Smash! Mayhem attracts cops, crash them! How long can you cause demolition? Drive down the road and smash everything. Missions will make destruction funnier. Mayhem is fun in our demolition game, crash and enjoy pure demolition drive!

Features of Blocky Cops Smash:

- City to crash
- Pedestrians to smash
- Cars to drive
- Mayhem to wreak
- Cops and military pursuit
- Destruction of environment

Crash & smash!
Wreak blocky mayhem, cause demolition - blocky city is yours to crash, warrior! Drive blokcy cars on the road. Mayhem won’t be unseen. Crash cops cars to make it unpunished, warrior. Blocky Cops Smash provides enough challenge, to keep demolition interesting. Drive, crash, smash - everything you see awaits destruction. Blocky mayhem on the go!

Drive blocky cars!
Destruction? Easy! Drive cars, wreak mayhem, crash the city with few buttons, warrior. Smash road cops with rockets. Smash and crash the city, demolition is simple. Drive carefully - water and demolition are bad for cars. Avoid your destruction - crash pursuing cops. Wreak demolition mayhem in blocky city - road destruction is fun!

Demolition nonstop!
Mayhem in the blocky city, destruction and demolition, stuff to crash, victims to smash - no plan, no goal, just enjoy road destruction and drive mighty cars as long as possible in Blocky Cops Smash, warrior! Complete destruction missions for better score. Blocky demolition drive awaits!

Smash everything, crash anything - welcome to road mayhem of Blocky Cops Smash!
